data.actual_result: It appears as raw text with roleID, e.g `<@&364870197078786049>`
data.expected_result: In the chat box, it's formatted as regular mentions, e.g `@role` in bold
data.short_description: Editing a message containing a role mention will display the raw text with roleID in the chat box instead of the bolded @ role name
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a message that contains a mentionnable role tag - Long press and edit this message
